revised_title: Sequential Formation and Utilization of Oocytes in the Mammalian Ovary
tldr: The article discusses the sequential formation and utilization of oocytes in the mammalian ovary. It presents evidence of a production line of oocytes in the fetal ovary and a decline in chiasma and recombination frequency with increasing maternal age, confirming the sequential use of oocytes in adult mice.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Oogenesis and Gametogenesis
